sentences.en: A chamber, such as the furnace of a steam locomotive, in which fuel is burned.
sentences.cn: 火箱，燃烧室一种燃料在里面燃烧的内室，例如蒸汽机车的燃烧室。

sentences.en: Also used as finish coat of locomotive and container.
sentences.cn: 也可作机车和集装箱的面漆.

sentences.en: At the conductor's whistle the engine - driver starts his locomotive - engine.
sentences.cn: 乘务员哨声一响,司机开动机车.

sentences.en: By now the diesel locomotive has been replaced by an electric one.
sentences.cn: 现在,电力机车已经取代了内燃机车.

sentences.en: Displaying some of his versatility, here Iqbal shows an HO electric locomotive, track and signals he made.
sentences.cn: 展示了他的一些多才多艺，在这里伊克巴尔显示，一何电力机车，轨道和信号，他所作的。

sentences.en: Hands and feet are locomotive organs.
He saw the locomotive bearing down on him.
sentences.cn: 他看见火车头向他压来.

sentences.en: He was killed by an onrushing locomotive.
sentences.cn: 他被飞驰而来的火车头撞死了。

sentences.en: How many coaches can that locomotive pull?
sentences.cn: 那个火车头能拉多少节客车?
蒸汽 / 内燃 / 电力机车

sentences.en: The 5 - ft driving wheels looked just like those of the ordinary locomotive except for the tyres.
sentences.cn: 5英尺的主动轮除轮箍外,几乎与普通机车一样.

sentences.en: The Locomotive Construction Company Ltd is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Trust.
sentences.cn: 机车建筑有限公司是该托拉斯的全资子公司。

sentences.en: The locomotive is coming at top speed.
sentences.cn: 火车头正以最高速度驶来.

sentences.en: The locomotive was dashed to pieces.
The steam locomotive has been superseded by the diesel locomotive.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽机车被柴油机车取代了.

sentences.en: The wheels were set further back on the original locomotive.
sentences.cn: 车轮安装得比原来机车的更靠后些.
